sentence.Network_en: They paid a lot of wampum for the job.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们为那工作付出很多的钱.

sentence.Network_en: At first they copied the Native Americans and used wampum.
sentence.Network_cn: 最初,他们模仿本土的美国人用贝壳串珠当作钱.

sentence.Network_en: I brought some wampum from North America.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从北美买了一些贝壳串珠.
